summary: A documentary that analyzes the modern educational system and argues that it squelches children's capacity for imagination, creativity, and independent thought.
cast: Ken Robinson|Yang Dongping|Andreas Schleicher|Qu Pei|Bai Jia Ye|Gerald Hüther|Arno Stern|Michèle Stern|Yakamoz Karakurt|Thomas Sattelberger|Patrick Kuhn|Kiley Hamlin|Janine Gellerman|André Stern|Pauline Stern|Antonin Stern|Pablo Pineda
title: Alphabet
